Awaiting Azure as he exited the base was 25' of
hulking TM3 power, speed and agility. Shadimus, who
had observed everything through an open comm channel,
had decided that a reunion could wait, ass a wave of
tragic deja vu struck him, remembering what Megatron
had driven him to during the Beast Wars, determined
that one great warrior falling from grace was one too
many. Activating his Vibroblades (OOC: for GM note,
these are exactly the same spec wise as the CADS-1
saber system for the cyclone mecha from the robotech
rpg), he stared grimly determined into the eyes of
Azure (anyone who's seen Gundam Wing Endless Waltz,
think Zechs in the Talgese three when the gundams
atack the serpentas on earth here) "If you're planning
on going to join the Preds, then you'll have to go
through me, for I am not about to watch another
Cybertronain legenadary warrior DECEND INTO
MADNESS!!!!". (OOC: Good luck to you and Azure Nic,
you two will need it :P LOL)
